name: Othermind: Pipe Dreamer II
description:
A traveler sailing on a small boat to an unspecified destination (who goes by the name of "Lauren") realizes that her boat has used up a lot of gem power. With the last few Lauren has, she lands on a nearby island in search for enough gems to last her the whole journey. 

Although the adversaries on the island are far larger than anything Lauren can handle on her own - she luckily has the power of life manipulation allowing her to take control of almost any being she can see and trek through the island's challenging environments using the creatures that pertain to it.

Controls:

  • Left click - shoot projectiles to posses other creatures
  • WASD keys - move
  • Space key - Jump
  • X - De-posses creature

The controls can be changed in the 'options' menu.

Credits:

  • Prownie; Designer, Character designer, Concept artist, Programmer, Sound designer (https://pixelbrowniesoftware.blogspot.com/)
  • Joe: Artist, Animator and Ending sprites. (https://automotiveenvironmentartdesign.blogspot.com/)
